name: SpongeBob SquarePants featuring Nicktoons: Globs of Doom
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)



For the first time ever, play as the villian and the 'hero'! Use teamwork for extra-awesome combo gadget attacks.

Play as the hero and the villian in this new slime-soaked adventure. Battle, puzzle and play through 5 NickToon environments to defeat the evil Globulous and his morphoid minions. All 10 players have mawgu gadgets that if used together have extra powers. Can villians and heroes really work together? Play and see!
